Class DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions

DownloadInstructions
public abstract static class DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions
extends DownloadInstructions.Instructions

A very simple implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which by-passes the persistence option.

Method Detail

getInputStream

public java.io.InputStream getInputStream(java.lang.String bitmapUid,
                                          java.lang.Object imageSpecs,
                                          java.lang.String url,
                                          BasisDownloadInstructions.InputStreamDownloadInstructor instructor)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions
Is invoked just before the stream download corresponding to the bitmap is started, provided its computed URL is not null nor empty.

This is a good place for fetching from a local cache the input stream related to the bitmap.

instructor - if you want the input stream download to be asynchronous, call CoreBitmapDownloader.InputStreamDownloadInstructor#setAsynchronous() and return null ; once the input stream has been download, invoke CoreBitmapDownloader.InputStreamDownloadInstructor#onDownloaded(InputStream).
Returns:
null, which means that the underlying DownloadInstructions.BitmapableBitmap cannot be retrieved from the persistence
Throws:
java.io.IOException

onInputStreamDownloaded

public java.io.InputStream onInputStreamDownloaded(java.lang.String bitmapUid,
                                                   java.lang.Object imageSpecs,
                                                   java.lang.String url,
                                                   java.io.InputStream inputStream)
The method does not use the provided inputStream, and just returns it.

Returns:
the provided InputStream, which means that the underlying DownloadInstructions.BitmapableBitmap is not persisted
